name: Lights Out (itch) (Aspect11)
description:
Our first jam went great and here we made this game "Lights out"

You are awake in a strange dark place , Dont know what made you come here and the whole place is dark and you are afraid of darkness and there is a dark creature in the place and your only hope is to Keep the lights ALIVE! 
 
Bug fixes Update V1.1:

Fixed AI not working properly

Added Windows Version
